attributes.title: A Cheeto prank app?

attributes.review: So, I saw this app on the trending section of the App Store. I decided “why not”. I downloaded it and when I opened it, I saw a photo of a puffer fish eating a carrot. 🐡🥕. And then I clicked the “x” in the top right of the screen and it had asked me to start a free trial for Apple Music. I clicked “no thanks”. And then the app crashed. I totally do not recommend this app.

attributes.review: there are so many reasons why i don’t like this app. to start off, the first thing i saw when i opened it was a cheeto? i’m not sure how a cheeto is relevant to trump’s “maga” agenda but regardless, it’s ridiculous. also, i strongly believe that this app is not suitable for children, or anyone really. the amount of hatred displayed in this app is disgusting and should not be supported. in addition, the app promotes rallies and large gatherings of people during a global pandemic in which doctors have strongly advised against. this is a danger to society and i can in no way support these things.
attributes.title: i can’t believe this is even in the app store
